biotools.summary:
a neural network based classifier for σ70 promoter prediction in Pseudomonas.

Sequence Analyser for the Prediction of Prokaryote Homology Inferred Regulatory Elements.

For sequences longer than 5k basepairs, it is advisable to download SAPPHIRE and run it locally.
